Abdul Wakeel Amadu


He was born on the 23rd of June, 2003 at New Atuabo, a suburb within the Tarkwa-Nsuaem Municipality. His parents are Alhaji Saeed and Hajia Hawa.

Career

He started his footballing career with Tarkwa Barcelona.

He had his basic education at Delcy Montesorri Academy, where he featured in school matches as the captain before continuing his studies at Islamic Senior High School (ISSEC).

He plays mostly as an attacker

He attained a degree in Oil and Gas Exploration from the University of Mines and Technology (UMaT)

He currently serves as the Assistant Coach to Spovis. They both lead the Islamic Youth team in New Atuabo to their first ever Eid Gala triumph in early 2024.

At his leisure time, he finds solace in the recitation of the Holy Qur'an
